Dialogue: I hope I made enough wishes! I've used all of the coins in my piggy bank.
Oh, you have some you can give me?
Thank you so much, now I can make more wishes!
You're a hero! Everyone will be so happy when we save the world!
I hope I made enough wishes! I've used all of the coins from my piggy bank.
My name is Grace and I've been throwing all of my money into the well.
I'm wishing for the world not to end.
If I only had a few more coins just to be sure!
There has to be some around the town! I want to do it myself, but I'm not old enough.
Mommy and Daddy won't let me leave the town.
You found more coins!
Thank you so much, now I can make more wishes! Everyone will be so happy when we save the world!
A brave adventurer like you probably isn't afraid of anything, huh?
I've heard that there are some ancient stone statues around town where you can talk to fairies!
I remember Daddy said there's one hidden deep in the woods, somewhere near the railroad tracks.
I wanna go find it, but it's too dangerous for me to go out in the woods.
Maybe if you find it, you can make a wish for us!
Have you found any coins? We're running out of time!
If you find some for me I'll tell you something super secret...
I've heard that there are some ancient stone statues near this town where you can talk to fairies!
I remember Daddy said there's one hidden deep in the wood, somewhere near the railroad track.
I'd love to find that statue, but it's too dangerous for me to go out in the woods.
Maybe if you find it, you can make a wish for us!
Hopefully this is enough, thanks!
